# thunder_network_vlan_global_oper (Data Source)

`thunder_network_vlan_global_oper`: Operational Status for the object vlan-global

## Example Usage

```terraform

  address  = var.dut9049

}

}

  value = ["${data.thunder_network_vlan_global_oper.thunder_network_vlan_global_oper}"]
}
```
